name: Action Bar
author: Daniel Buchner
description: An iconified navigation that fires user-defined actions.

attributes.mode: Visual modes for an action. (full, text, icon)

setters.group: Sets the current group of actions to display.

events.command: Fires each time an action is clicked or pressed.  The event contains the command name of the action.

getters.icon: Gets the path of the image icon.
getters.label: Gets the action label.

setters.icon: Sets an icon for an action.
setters.label: Sets the action label.
setters.group: Defines the group this action belongs to. Actions can be assigned to multiple groups by separating group numbers with spaces. eg.(1 2 5)

attributes.icon: Sets an icon for an action.
attributes.label: Sets the action label.
attributes.group: Defines the group this action belongs to.
